full_summary:
# Coaching Services Solicitation

## Project Background

Elections Canada requires coaching services to develop the key leadership competencies and behavioral competencies of its employees. The coaching services will aid employees in developing a clear understanding of their needs, ambitions, and career paths based on their talents, potential, and experiences. This initiative aims to improve the skills and competencies of employees, ensuring they are equipped to handle emerging issues and adapt to a changing work environment.

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: ECFT-RFP-2022-1629
* Date of Publication: 29 September 2022
* Tender Closing Date: 10 November 2022 (13:00:00)

## Requirement

Elections Canada seeks professional coaching services to provide individual and group coaching to its employees. The objective of the coaching services is to help employees develop their key leadership competencies and behavioral competencies, focusing on skills and competencies development to achieve their full potential.

## Period of the Contract

The contract period will be from the effective date of the contract to 31 March 2024 (initial term). The contractor will grant Elections Canada irrevocable options to extend the contract period by three additional periods of one year each.

## Submission of Proposals

Offerors must submit their proposals in either official language of Canada, and all communication with Elections Canada must be directed to the contracting authority. Questions and inquiries must be submitted in writing to proposal@elections.ca no later than the deadline indicated in the RFP.

## Evaluation Methodology

The evaluation will be based on a competitive procurement strategy, with the lowest cost per point as the selection criterion.

## Important Dates and Deadlines

* Tender Closing Date: 10 November 2022 (13:00:00)
* Submission of Proposals: Proposals must be submitted electronically through the epost Connect service
* Deadline for Questions and Inquiries: Questions and inquiries must be submitted in writing to proposal@elections.ca no later than the deadline indicated in the RFP

## Additional Information

Elections Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Further information and documents can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell service (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders). Debrieﬁng sessions will be available to bidders upon request.
